from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_min_travel_distance(A, B, Q, S, T, X):
    INF = 10 * 10
    S = [-INF] + S + [2 * INF]
    T = [-INF] + T + [2 * INF]

    def dis(x):
        RS = bisect_left(S, x)
        LS = RS - 1
        RT = bisect_left(T, x)
        LT = RT - 1
        ans = [0] * 4
        ans[0] = max(S[RS], T[RT]) - x
        ans[1] = x - min(S[LS], T[LT])
        ans[2] = S[RS] - T[LT] + min(S[RS] - x, x - T[LT])
        ans[3] = T[RT] - S[LS] + min(T[RT] - x, x - S[LS])
        return min(ans)
    results = []
    for x in X:
        results.append(dis(x))
    return results
